description: This is a botanical experiment I created to see how well a tomato sprout clipped from its roots could regrow itself. Cut down at only 3 inches tall, it was transplanted into a tiny clay pot and given generous light. The dirt was mixed with some mycorrhizal inoculant. It has since grown to be one of my healthiest tomato plants. 2021
